entries.arrived_at_delivery: Stay here until the pick-up ship arrives.
entries.arrived_at_pickup: Stay here until the drop-off ship arrives.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Warning. Attack craft incoming. Imperial signatures detected. >
entries.autorewardbody: You have been paid 2000 credits for services rendered to the Talus Space Station.
entries.docking_complete_delivery: Smooth as silk. Good luck to you!
entries.docking_complete_pickup: Docking clamps are clear. Now shoo!
entries.docking_started_delivery: Our team is standing by to receive the package.
entries.docking_started_pickup: Clamps open and ready for dock. Package ready for transfer.
entries.failed_destroyed: That didn't work exactly the way that we planned. We're scrapping the rest of your assignments. Return to the station if you want to try again.
entries.found_loc_d: Good work, pilot. Now proceed to this navigation waypoint and deliver the package.
entries.found_loc_p: Good morning, pilot. I've been assigned to monitor your progress today. We've got a short series of jobs for you. Begin by flying to this waypoint and meet your first pickup.
entries.hello_d: We're ready to receive the package whenever you are, pilot.
entries.hello_p: Hello, pilot. Are you here to pick up the package? Dock whenever you're ready.
entries.quest_dock1_d: Move in close to the drop-off ship and press the 'U' key to dock and receive the cargo.
entries.quest_dock2_d: Move in close to the pick-up ship and press the 'U' key to dock and transfer the cargo.
entries.quest_location_d: This assignment takes place in the Corellia system.
entries.quest_rendezvous1_d: Travel to the specified location and await the arrival of the drop-off ship.
entries.quest_rendezvous2_d: Travel to the specified location and await the arrival of the pick-up ship.
entries.title: Corellia System: Smuggle a Package
entries.title_d: You have been assigned a simple smuggling mission. You need only pick up the cargo from one ship and deliver it to another ship in the same system.
